name: Long Live Santa!
description: Santa is dead. Now the remaining bearded men of the Norwegian wilderness must fight to the death. Will you be the next Santa, or die in the snow? Punch, slice, outwit your way to a fulfilling new seasonal job in this online PvP third-person fighter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Modern quad-core (AMD FX-Series or newer, Intel Core i5 or faster) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5770 or faster, nVidia GeForce GT 640 or faster DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
